title: Landing Page Load and Responsive Layout
description: Verify that the landing page loads quickly with all images optimized and that the layout is responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the FoodVision landing page URL.
Check that the page loading time is within acceptable limits (e.g., < 3 seconds) and images are compressed.
Verify that all landing page components (Hero, Pricing, Social Proof, Problem/Solution sections) render correctly.
Resize the browser window to simulate tablet and mobile screen sizes.
Verify that the layout adapts correctly without content overlapping or horizontal scrolling.

title: Authentication Workflow - Successful Login
description: Test that a registered user can log in successfully using the authentication modal and access protected routes.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page.
Click on the login button to open the authentication modal.
Enter valid registered user credentials.
Submit the login form.
Verify that the user is authenticated and redirected to the appropriate protected page or dashboard.
Attempt to access a protected route directly.
Verify that access is granted without redirection to login.

title: Authentication Workflow - Registration and Password Recovery
description: Validate the registration process works properly and the password recovery functionality sends reset emails.

steps.description: Open the authentication modal and switch to registration form.
Enter valid new user details and submit the registration form.
Verify account is created successfully and user is logged in or redirected appropriately.
Log out and open the authentication modal.
Click the password recovery link and enter registered email.
Verify that a reset password email is sent.
Attempt password reset using the received link.
Verify password is reset successfully and login with new password works.

title: Payment Gateway Integration - Successful Checkout
description: Check that the payment process via Cakto gateway integrates correctly with email pre-filling and subscription activation.

steps.description: Select a pricing plan from the landing page.
If unauthenticated, proceed to authentication modal and complete login.
Verify that after authentication, user is redirected to Cakto checkout with their email pre-filled.
Complete payment using valid card details.
Verify payment is processed successfully and subscription status is updated in the system.
Navigate to client dashboard.
Verify the subscription plan status displays correctly as active.

title: Client Dashboard - Subscription Status and Downloadable Deliverables
description: Verify client dashboard correctly shows current subscription status and allows downloading of digital assets securely.

steps.description: Login as a client user with an active subscription.
Navigate to the client dashboard.
Confirm the subscription plan status is displayed correctly.
Check that the list of downloadable deliverables is visible.
Attempt to download each deliverable.
Verify that downloads initiate and files are correct and accessible only to the user with valid permissions.
Try accessing downloadable files of another user without permission.
Verify access is denied due to Row Level Security enforcement.

title: Admin Dashboard - Access Control and Client Management
description: Ensure only administrators can access the Admin dashboard and that client searching and user management works as expected.

steps.description: Attempt to access the Admin Dashboard URL while logged out.
Verify that access is denied or redirected to login.
Login as a client user and attempt to access the Admin Dashboard.
Verify that access is blocked or redirected due to insufficient permissions.
Login as an administrator.
Navigate to Admin Dashboard.
Verify the dashboard loads correctly with client and file management controls.
Search for clients by name or email.
Verify search results display relevant clients accurately.

title: Admin Dashboard - File Upload and Delete Functionality
description: Test that administrators can upload files for clients and delete files correctly with UI feedback.

steps.description: Login as administrator and open Admin Dashboard.
Select a client and initiate file upload.
Upload a valid file (image or document).
Verify the file uploads successfully with confirmation message.
Verify that client receives a notification about the new file.
Delete an existing file.
Confirm file is removed with appropriate UI feedback and no errors.
Attempt to upload an unsupported file type or very large file.
Verify that the upload fails with clear error messaging.

title: Secure Cloud Storage - Row Level Security Enforcement
description: Validate that Supabase Storage Row Level Security properly restricts access so only authorized users can read and write their files.

steps.description: Login as user A and upload files to their storage space.
Login as user B and attempt to access user A's files via direct URL or UI.
Verify that user B is denied access to user A's files.
Attempt unauthorized file upload or modification using APIs outside UI.
Verify that Row Level Security blocks unauthorized operations.

title: UI Performance and Animation Smoothness
description: Ensure that image compression, lazy loading, and Framer Motion animations execute smoothly without blocking user interactions.

steps.description: Navigate through all main UI pages: Landing, Client Dashboard, Admin Dashboard.
Verify images load progressively using lazy loading and that compressed images render clearly.
Observe Framer Motion animations on page transitions, sliders, and interactions for smoothness and no jank or delay.
Interact rapidly with UI components (e.g., sliders, buttons) to confirm responsiveness.
Ensure UI feedback animations complete smoothly without blocking or UI freeze.

title: Error Handling - Invalid Login and Payment Failures
description: Verify that invalid user inputs and payment errors are handled gracefully with clear user feedback.

steps.description: Attempt login with incorrect username or password.
Verify that an appropriate error message is displayed without revealing sensitive information.
Attempt registration with an already existing email.
Verify error message informs about duplicate account.
During payment checkout, simulate a declined card or payment failure.
Verify that payment failure message is displayed and user remains on payment page.
After payment failure, attempt resubmission.
Verify that user can retry payment without data loss.
